message: Many people might believe that slavery is a thing of the past, but Love Justice International is here to tell us that still today, young girls are being forced or deceived to leave their homes, usually with the promises of marriage or money, only to be sold, raped, tortured, or imprisoned.

data.description: Join Love Justice International in fighting one of our worlds most horrendous injustices.
data.title: How You Can Help Save Beautiful Lives From The Horrors Of Trafficking
